document.full_text: southern california acknowledges its football program committed ncaa violations while building a west coast dynasty over the past decade. the trojans simply believe last year's nearly unprecedented punishment didn't fit the crime.
document.title: ncaa rejects usc's appeal of football sanctions
lines_and_colors: southern california acknowledges its football program committed ncaa violations while building a west coast dynasty over the past decade. the trojans simply believe last year's nearly unprecedented punishment didn't fit the crime.
